response.answer_text: Topato is an online US retailer webcomic merchandise company. The company has been established in the year of 2004 by Jeffrey Rowland after he lost his job. Company actually produces Clothes, stickers and books. Topato logo take a look here.  Thanks Suresh
The hero of wigu tinkle is Topato   Topato Co is online retailer of this webcomic. Hope you would be satisfied with answer here.
